Class DefaultArc

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.defaults.globals.DefaultArc
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IsDefaultArc, IsDefaultOptionsElement

    public final class DefaultArc
extends java.lang.Object
implements IsDefaultArc
    CHART.JS default values for ARC element.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      DefaultArc()

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getAngle()
      Returns the arc angle to cover.
      java.lang.String getBackgroundColorAsString()
      Returns the background color.
      BorderAlign getBorderAlign()
      Returns the property to set the border alignment on chart datasets.
      java.lang.String getBorderColorAsString()
      Returns the border color.
      int getBorderWidth()
      Returns the border width.
      double getWeight()
      Returns the relative thickness of the dataset.
      Providing a value for weight will cause the pie or doughnut dataset to be drawn with a thickness relative to the sum of all the dataset weight values.
